example_sentences.en: The water is boiling in the kettle.
The man owned a big house.
The man returned to his house.
The man worried about his son.
The man lied to his friend.
The Earth revolves around the sun.

translations.en: to stand up, to rise, to perform

example_sentences.en: The man stood up from his place.
The manager met the new employee.
The friends met at the cafe.

translations.en: to stroll, to wander, to roam

example_sentences.en: The man strolled in the park.
The man gave the book to the boy.
The teacher added salt to the food.
The man gave his son a lot of money.
example_sentences.ru: Мужчина дал своему сыну много денег.

translations.en: to ride, to mount, to get on

example_sentences.en: The student complained about the difficult exam.
The man complained about the difficulty of the work.
I am waiting for the bus.
I wished for success in my studies.
The man lived a happy life.
The student lived in the city.

translations.en: to care for/about, to be interested in

example_sentences.en: The student cares about his studies.
The student forgot his books at home.

translations.en: to rely on, to depend on
to end; to finish; to expire
to prevent, to forbid, to ban

example_sentences.en: The policeman prevented the man from entering.
The boy asked for a pen.
The boy played with the ball.
The man measured the length of the room.

translations.en: to search for, to look for

example_sentences.en: The man is searching for the key.
The bird flew in the sky.
The man lay down on the bed.

example_sentences.ar: الْمَاءُ يَتَجَمَّدُ فِي دَرَجَةِ الصِّفْرِ الْمِئَوِيَّةِ.
example_sentences.translit: al-māʾu yatajammadu fī darajat aṣ-ṣifr al-miʾawiyyah.
example_sentences.en: Water freezes at zero degrees Celsius.
example_sentences.ru: Вода замерзает при нуле градусов Цельсия.

example_sentences.en: The student learned a new lesson.

translations.en: to fall, to be located, to occur

example_sentences.en: The house is located on the mountain.
The lesson began at eight o'clock.

translations.en: to please, to impress, to like

example_sentences.en: The book pleased me. (I liked the book.)
The man promised his son a gift.
The students discussed the problem with the professor.
Sara arranged the books on the shelf.
The man stood in front of the house.
The man replied to the question.
The student rejected the teacher's proposal.

translations.en: to fall, to happen, to occur

example_sentences.en: The book fell on the ground.
The family moved to a new house.
The artist sang a beautiful song.
The man swam in the sea.
The child cried for his mother.
The student returned the book to the library.

translations.en: to go up, to rise, to emerge

example_sentences.en: The father allowed his son to play.

translations.en: to show, to offer, to display

example_sentences.en: The man bought a new car.
The man put the book on the table.
The man tried to open the door.

translations.en: to present, to offer, to provide
to beware, to be careful, to warn

example_sentences.en: The man was wary of the dog.

translations.en: to be cut off, to be interrupted, to break off

example_sentences.en: The electricity was cut off suddenly.
The train arrived at the station.

translations.en: to take; to consume; to deal with

example_sentences.en: The man came to the house.
The student tried a new idea.

translations.en: to happen, to occur, to take place
to wake up, to become awake/sober

example_sentences.en: The man woke up early from his sleep.
example_sentences.ru: Мужчина проснулся рано от своего сна.

example_sentences.en: The boy jumped over the barrier.
The boy was happy with the gift.
The man spoke with his friend.

translations.en: to repair, to fix, to improve

example_sentences.en: The boy drew a beautiful picture.
The child was born in the hospital.
The man sat on the chair.
The student listened to the teacher attentively.
The man looked at the sky.
The water in the well decreased.
The students met in the library.

translations.en: to descend, to go down, to alight

example_sentences.en: The man got out of the car.
The student compared the old book with the new one.
example_sentences.ru: Студент сравнил старую книгу с новой.

example_sentences.en: My dress became small after washing.
The manager tasked the employee with the assignment.

translations.en: to suffer, to undergo, to experience

example_sentences.en: The patient suffers from severe pain.
The company plans for a better future.

translations.en: to think, to assume, to believe (that)

example_sentences.en: The man thought that he was late.
The girl danced at the party.

translations.en: to waste, to lose, to squander
to get lost, to be lost

example_sentences.en: I got lost in the city.
The player trained a lot for the match.
My grandfather passed away last year.
example_sentences.ru: Мой дедушка скончался в прошлом году.

example_sentences.en: The child smiled at the blue sky.
He was able to do that.
I was able to do that.
The student succeeded in the exam.
The man got tired from work.
The man wanted to drink water.
The man walked to the house.
I thanked my friend for the help.
example_sentences.ru: Я поблагодарил своего друга за помощь.
